\subsection{\-Detailed \-Description}
\-Global constant definitions. \begin{DoxyAuthor}{\-Author}
\-Kota \-Yamaguchi 
\end{DoxyAuthor}
\begin{DoxyDate}{\-Date}
2012
\end{DoxyDate}
\-The header file for a \-Matlab mex function that uses \-Open\-C\-V library. \-The file includes definition of \hyperlink{class_mx_array}{\-Mx\-Array} class that converts between mx\-Array and a couple of std\-:\-: and cv\-:\-: data types including cv\-::\-Mat. 

\-Definition in file \hyperlink{mexopencv_8hpp_source}{mexopencv.\-hpp}.
